website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want two different types of sliders, but other matrix choices may offer a better value.
pros: Set includes a variety: some with felt bottoms for extra cushioning/scratch prevention
others with smooth plastic bottoms for carpet
cons: They have the tendency to slip while moving, and they don't work well with heavy furniture

customer_reviews.title: Great Combination Pack
customer_reviews.text: Great combination pack! We were having our living room floor redone from carpet to hardwood. Our furniture is very heavy and hard to move on the carpet, even with 2 people. When we placed the smooth pieces under the furniture, I could move them by myself. Once the new floor was in, we placed the felt pads under the furniture to keep from scratching the flooring. The pads stayed in place very well. If we ever need more, we will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these furniture movers because we are remodeling several rooms in our home and are constantly moving heavy furniture from one spot to another. These have been perfect. I've used the felt ones to move our new appliances onto the new wood floors that we put in our kitchen. And the plastic ones are equally great for moving furniture around on the carpeted areas of the living room. Some of the furniture would be too heavy for me to move on my own, but using the movers has made it possible in most cases.
customer_reviews.author: PREZSGAL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!! Esp for Solo Movers!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! Great for moving furniture w/o damaging your furniture or your flooring. I use these under my pool table to easily move it back and forth between 2 rooms solo! They are very level and durable, so moving my pool table doesn't cause the pool table to become uneven and they aren't crushed but it's weight. I've also moved my sectional couch and a bed and these are just all around great and O-mazing pricing for quality and how many you get! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SoleCipher

customer_reviews.title: The plastic movers make easy work of gliding heavy furniture across carpets and tile ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic movers make easy work of gliding heavy furniture across carpets and tile floors. I'm 76 years old and can move heavy furniture with ease, all by myself. The felt pads make moving furniture across my wood floors a breeze and I don't need to worry about scratching the floors. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Handy helper
customer_reviews.text: Just had a new kitchen floor put in yesterday. When the men put everything back I made them use these under the legs of the varied furniture and appliances. First, a little fess up time here. I am 69 years old, have had back and shoulder surgeries, and can no longer move things to clean behind them. With these movers I am amazed at how easy it is to move things out and back. Even I can do it misled now! I a, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Have a heavy kitchen table that these are able to handle perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after I tried to move a very heavy kitchen table and ended up scratching my kitchen hardwood floor. I used the large pieces with a soft bottom and I am surprisingly able to move the very heavy table effortlessly across the hardwood floor without scratching it. If I could give it 6 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Macias

customer_reviews.title: Just what we need!
customer_reviews.text: These look perfect. I say look as we have not used them yet. We are in the process of moving into a new home with oak floors. I purchased the Furniture Movers to ensure we could move the furniture around after the movers leave without damaging the floor. I was recently in the moving section of a department store They sold a similar product which did not look half as good as these and they were over priced. I know these will help us set up the furniture in our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: But we still like to be self sufficient
customer_reviews.text: My husband and are seniors and don't have the lifting power we used to. But we still like to be self sufficient. The pads that we ordered are large enough for us to slip under heavy furniture by just tilting. Then the piece moves easily across carpet so I can vacuum. I haven't used the floor sliders but expect them to work just as well. This is a great and simple product. Very nice quality and nicely priced.
customer_reviews.author: Carl fejedelem

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: We just had our floors redone and these glides have helped us out tremendously by replacing furniture and moving stuff back and forth. Would recommend you getting some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and did the trick. i was able to keep put the entertainment center about 6 feet from the wall when we moved in. i set up the TV, units/devices and wires, then slipped the gliders underneath and effortlessly slid the whole unit to the wall. couldn't have asked for an easier item to use.
customer_reviews.author: shadyshall

customer_reviews.title: They have worked great so far and I'm very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put on my desk in a shaggy carpeted room. I have a custom built PC and have to move my desk every time I want to get at it. To make matters even tougher I had to raise my desk with couch feet. Screwing these in really destroyed the integrity of support the desk offers, scaring me every time I have to pull out my desk. I put got the furniture movers so I would be able to slide my desk out without any lifting involved. They have worked great so far and I'm very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: starfishey

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: This i an awesome product! Ive used them in the past with great success.My couch us a sofa bed that weighs a TON. Without the pads I'm unable to budge the sofa but with pads the sofa is easily moved to allow cleaning the base boards. But I will note that while the pads are in place the sofa does not slide about, I'm excited to try the felt [ads on my stained concrete floors.
customer_reviews.author: Betty B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Makes Moving Furniture a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: Purchase arrived quickly, and there was great communication from the seller. I used these furniture movers on my linoleum kitchen floor to move my kitchen table. I used the other four on my carpeted living room floor to move my coffee table. These furniture movers are made of quality materials. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TurboShopper

customer_reviews.title: do these Ezy Glydes work great! We have a huge wall unit that had ...
customer_reviews.text: Boy, do these Ezy Glydes work great! We have a huge wall unit that had to be moved to another room. No way even two husky men could manage it. But with Ezy Glydes this 65+ senior was able to move it myself! Have heavy boxes that need to go from one room to another? Moving? No more aching back from trying to move something that is just TOO heavy! It doesn't make sense NOT to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great service from My EZ Home Solutions. My furniture movers arrived before the scheduled date. We just moved a large piece of furniture to a new house, but we didn't know exactly where it would be ending up, so I bought a set of these. One of the legs of our piece of furniture ls a llittle weak, and these sliders took the strain off of it while it was being moved. They work great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Schwing

customer_reviews.title: Heavy stuff can now be moved!
customer_reviews.text: They work as promised and making moving heavy furniture doable. I got a new heavy recliner sofa and these are under the regular legs, so I can vacuum under the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: ALICE WAND

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect I used these for a much used recliner that ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect I used these for a much used recliner that needs pulled away from the wall to put into reclined position. The room is carpeted making sliding chair effortlessly. A small child could more this chair.
customer_reviews.author: D-T-G1

customer_reviews.title: Easy move!!
customer_reviews.text: These made our recent move so incredibly easy. We put huge bureaus and china cabinets on these and moved them with one hand like they were on wheels. Since we were dealing with both carpet and hard wood floors, we bought the variety pack and all worked great! In fact, we cut the hard wood ones down and just left the china cabinet on them for easy slide-out cleaning behind it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Boone

customer_reviews.title: but needed something more to actually move huge furniture like my bed and dresser
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a home with new hardwood floors and wanted to preserve them. I purchased a bunch of the tiny stick on circle felt pads, but needed something more to actually move huge furniture like my bed and dresser. These worked perfectly! I only wish more came in a pack but I'm sure they do. Would definitely buy again and tell anyone moving furinture for any reason these are must haves.
customer_reviews.author: Averie Bailey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Just used the ones for carpet so far but they are great. I got a new hospital bed, (my care company changed venders), it did not have wheels! I looked at a bunch and picked this, my wife is happy, she says it moves easier than the old one with wheels but doesn't move when I am being put into bed! From these, I will bet that the ones for bare floors will be great also, I will update when we use those.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C. Rutschow

customer_reviews.title: and they work better than I could have hoped
customer_reviews.text: We have only used the ones designed for carpet, and they work better than I could have hoped. We have a deep plush carpet in the guest room and a heavy iron bed, it has been really difficult to move. Once we put the gliders under the legs, I can move the bed easily myself! They came quickly too, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Reffner

customer_reviews.title: ... to move around my nursery furniture until I was happy with the arrangement
customer_reviews.text: I used these on carpet to move around my nursery furniture until I was happy with the arrangement. It would have been impossible to move the furniture around without these. Once we put them under (very easy) the pieces slid across the carpet with no problem. Even at 30 weeks pregnant I could rearrange furniture all day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. I have used both the sliders and the ones with the rubber on the bottom to keep the furniture stationary on tile floor. I had to clean up a headboard and the rubber ones helped to keep it from sliding out from me while working on it. I would recommend them to anyone moving or refinishing furniture. They are a good size - not too big or small and seem to be well made. I've moved some very heavy furniture by myself with the sliders.
customer_reviews.author: XC60 Owner

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality by Comparison
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped promptly and in decent plastic bag packaging. I have not yet used the product, but the quality looks very similar to other branded furniture slides own that I am extremely pleased with. I appreciate how My EZ Home Solutions follows up directly with the customer to see if there are any issues, concerns, and feedback on their product. So far so good on the experience, but will update my review after fully using the furniture slides. I'm expecting a positive one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase! My order arrived right on time as expected and the furniture movers are fantastic! I keep them tucked in my work bag to use at each clients' house (I am in real estate and help clients prepare their home for sale) and they are always delighted I have them and their floors are protected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mullarkey

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving EZ
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Moved large oak heavy wooden bookcase by myself. Package includes movers for use on carpet or hard surfaces. I just tilted the bookcase, placed one under each corner and the bookcase glided easily across the carpet and hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Tyger

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I received the furniture movers promptly and used them in the move to my new condo. I like the fact that there were movers for both the hardwood floors and the carpeting. The hardwood floor movers work great and I'm able to move my bedroom furniture around with no problem. I would recommend these movers for anyone looking for an easy way to move heavy furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and very effective !!!
customer_reviews.text: It really is a great solution. I personally use it for two purposes, primarily for working out and secondly for moving my furniture. For working out, it works great. It's smooth on the base, while preventing me from slipping. For moving furniture it works the same way. Ensures that due to the smooth base I can move my furniture, but due to the foamy top, the furniture stays fixed on the movers. Great product with great value.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya

customer_reviews.title: now I can move them easily and get the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for. I was getting really frustrated not being able to clean up under the beds, now I can move them easily and get the job done...I'm sure it will help getting the allergy fact away. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: REGINA MERCADO

customer_reviews.title: Easy movers, easy to find
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn't bring myself to love these since they are, in fact, furniture movers. Easy to purchase online. Delivered on time. Already put to use. And easier to buy on Amazon than trying to figure out where these would exist at a Home Depot or Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: EZ glides are great!
customer_reviews.text: EZ glides are the greatest things since sliced white bread. We painted our entire first floor - both stone tile and carpeting - and moved our furniture out of the way with ease including two large curios and our antique sofa. We also use them for Spring and Fall cleaning to get underneath our large pieces of furniture. They're indispensable; every home, condo, and apartment should have them.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Carl

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the felt ones yet, but so far the others are perfect for the heavy furniture on my living room carpet. I am leaving the sliders under the feet permanently so I can move furniture around for arrangement and cleaning. We will see if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: martyzzz

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products. I used them to move several pieces of furniture from one side of the room to another by myself (I'm a 70 yr. old woman) over porcelain tile. They moved so easily and have such a low profile that I've left them in place in order to facilitate small moves for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: glad i tried them!
customer_reviews.text: even after reading a lot of great reviews, i was skeptical but i thought i'd try them. and i am so glad i did. moving a very large, heavy bookcase, from my bedroom to my office -- moving it across carpet (using hard plastic side) and across my new laminate floor (using felt side) was a breeze. i had a heavy box delivered yesterday and i placed 4 of these under the box -- also worked well! and my floors look great.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Moving furniture made easy
customer_reviews.text: Well the new furniture finally arrived, and these "movers" were used on smooth, tile and carpet. Worked pretty much flawlessly! You have to use caution and a little "lift" at the junctions of carpet/tile.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Furniture moves quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that these fit with the decor and easy to move furniture around with.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffri-Scott Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Love the sliders
customer_reviews.text: Love the sliders, perfect size as described. Makes my life a lot easier, moving furniture making vacuuming a lot easier. Yes I would buy again, and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SUZ. .

customer_reviews.title: Dealing
customer_reviews.text: When I bought them I thought they were all 8 for a carpet they are not they are for for carpet for for floor I am dealing with what I have
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie schneider

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE BACK-SAVERS!
customer_reviews.text: used these today to help a friend clear out her large family room for carpet cleaning. wow, these were GREAT! we've had mover pads before but never ones for use on wood floors, and this kit had both types - wood floors and carpet. they worked perfectly and made the work effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Gottaluvlabs

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous little helpers. I moved a whole bedroom suite with these sliders--heavy French Provincial furniture, crafted of sold walnut in the 1940s, & I moved it myself at 72, with these sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: They work well. I didn't give 5 stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I didn't give 5 stars because sometimes when I'm moving the furniture they come out from underneath. Then I have to stop and reposition them to continue moving the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: virginia harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: also had my two daughters (4 and 6) push for fun and they loved that they were able to move ...
customer_reviews.text: I only used the carpet ones so far and they are exactly what i needed to move 2 heavy dressers b/w bedrooms with ease.. also had my two daughters (4 and 6) push for fun and they loved that they were able to move it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: All items were moved easily while protecting my hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I used the EZ Home movers for furniture and for kitchen appliances and they worked as promised. All items were moved easily while protecting my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Etter

customer_reviews.title: They worked great. I have very heavy furniture to move around ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked great. I have very heavy furniture to move around to vacuum and mop. I can glide everything around now very easily. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Smart way to move heavy stuff
customer_reviews.text: Four disks for carpet, and four disks for hard floors. These work very well and this makes moving so much easier. These are a good size to put 1 under each corner of the furniture. Each disk has a tacky side so that the furniture will not slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Bought a few packs of these at a great price. I love the mix of carpet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few packs of these at a great price. I love the mix of carpet and hardwood floor movers (my house is hardwood downstairs and carpet upstairs), so this was a perfect buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for the furniture we needed to move. Would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Really like how it comes with 2 sets -- 4 gliders for carpet and 4 for hardwood floors. I needed these to move some heavy pieces of furniture around on both hardwood floor and carpet by myself and they did the trick. I was able to move everything by myself. The only challenge was lifting up the pieces of furniture to get them on the coaster, but once I was able to do that everything else was a breeze. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors in my studio apartment. My daybed is pretty heavy to move to clean under. With these sliders it's a breeze to move it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ciciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Just bought them to move our furniture while we installed new flooring since we cant out it out side we have ro move it from one side to the other they worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Wish i had these years ago. Just bought them to move our furniture while we installed new flooring since we cant out it out side we have ro move it from one side to the other they worked great .
customer_reviews.author: christina preston

customer_reviews.title: These furniture movers are wonderful. My new couch is very heavy and I ...
customer_reviews.text: These furniture movers are wonderful. My new couch is very heavy and I could barely move it out from the wall to vacuum behind it. Now,, it slides easily and does not mark the floor. I love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These gliders are PERFECT and the variety pack is an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Just bought new metal bunk beds that were nearly impossible for me to move thru carpet. The plastic sliders work great on the carpet and the felt sliders work great on our new sofa on downstairs hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Mama

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have some physical limitations and I find ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have some physical limitations and I find that the slides make it easier to move furniture. I haven't had them very long so can't speak to how they hold up. But as I said at the beginning: so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: the A reviewer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for me because I have carpet downstairs and laminate ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me because I have carpet downstairs and laminate flooring upstairs, so I needed both kinds to move furniture around. They are exactly as described and worked perfectly to move a dresser, a nightstand and a bookcase around.
customer_reviews.author: debleo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Makes moving big furniture much easier. Used on rug with a very heavy armoire. Would not have been able to more without these.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Work well, make moving easier and safer
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Worked great moving a dresser on carpet, and a sofa on hardwood. Handy to get the 2 varieties in one package. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Used to swap 2 rooms of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Had to swap 2 rooms of furniture with only one person. These pads were the ONLY thing that allowed him to be able to do that. Was able to swap the rooms of furniture no problem.
customer_reviews.author: BOREDrightNOW

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: They are the best sliders, I have placed them under every one of our furniture & because of that we are able to move the heaviest furniture with ease.I would recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Prakash Beharilal

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These furniture movers are great! I can no longer lift heavy things, and these made moving bedroom furniture around a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great gliders – so easy on my back!
customer_reviews.text: As a disabled senior, in the past it has been most difficult for me to move even a normal sized chair. However, those days are gone, as these gliders make moving my furniture a breeze. Thank you all very kindly for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great little helpers
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had to move ALL the furniture out of our living room and dining room to have our floors refinished. Then we moved it all back. These little helpers saved the day. They made this a doable task and kept our floors from being scratched. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: loves books

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and I will still recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I will still recommend it. But the complain I have is that the pads come off frequently as I move a furniture. I believe this happens especially for lighter furniture. Works better with heavier ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They slip out from under even the heaviest item, ...
customer_reviews.text: They slip out from under even the heaviest item, and floor almost got scratched. They just don't stay in place
customer_reviews.author: N. Roggy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing -- esp for moving really heavy objects
customer_reviews.text: Put these under the legs of my super-heavy sleeper sofa -- now I can move that sofa with just one hand to vacuum underneath. Amazing product! I came back and bought a second set. A lifetime fan now.
customer_reviews.author: KDSTTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Best invention since frozen pizza
customer_reviews.text: These things are slick! (no pun intended) I needed to move a piece of furniture that weighs an easy 1000 lbs. - several times in one day. Levered up each corner, placed one of these little disks underneath, and viola! I could slide it around with minimal effort. The inventor should be knighted!
customer_reviews.author: Kory Edwards Valley Gun Works

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised. Cost effective. I have no ...
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised. Cost effective. I have no complaints. And now, when my cat tries to hide behind the couch, I can get at the fuzz all without having to break my back!
customer_reviews.author: SHK

customer_reviews.title: Makes furniture moving easier on your back and your floors
customer_reviews.text: What surprised me was how well these work over carpet, hardwood, even the smooth concrete in the garage. I can move large pieces of furniture around myself almost effortlessly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for rearranging our bedroom. Moved a bureau and a dresser.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bon Jour Zam, I would like to inform you that that the easy glides worked as they were intended. I have usually large and heavy furniture, and when I utilized your product it made it much easier to move the furniture. Thank you!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value and works great for furniture. I bought for glide workouts, wish they were larger for feet.

customer_reviews.title: These were great! I am having new floors put in and ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great! I am having new floors put in and needed to move furniture by myself. These made the job very easy and I'm getting another set.

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I only bought these so my Roomba could get under the couches and the coffee table, but they're great. You can't see them and they allow me to move easily without worrying about scratching my hardwood floors.. I'll keep them under all my furniture from now on. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: A. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The product works as promised. I believe they could ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works as promised. I believe they could be slightly larger. I am moving a free standing fireplace and television which require more than four discs or larger discs.

customer_reviews.title: Makes rearranging heavy furniture easy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these EZ Glide disks. They make it so easy to move heavy furniture around. I am 70 yrs old, and with them I was able to rearrange my living room furniture by myself.i really liked that the set came with both the hard plastic disks for sliding on carpet and the felt disks for using on hard floor surfaces.

customer_reviews.title: Slide & separate!
customer_reviews.text: Real Review, they work good for sliding heavy furniture. Gave 4 stars only because my ent center legs caused pads to lift up & separate glue a lil bit! I'll fix with gorilla glue
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON G

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: They work beautifully. I use them on my antique sofa with casters so my oriental rug won't be damaged bu the brass wheels.

customer_reviews.text: Really nice product to have. Can easily move heavy furniture across carpet. Love it

customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the sliders you can find in the store, and they work perfectly for keeping hidden under heavier objects, like a washer and dryer, in protecting hardwood surfaces.

customer_reviews.text: We just used them and they work great. I like that we can also use them for hardwood floors.

customer_reviews.text: I got u furniture mover n love them. I don't have to worry about getting any scratches on my floor

customer_reviews.text: Great! We've used these to move several pieces of furniture around the house.

customer_reviews.text: Terrific for moving heavy items, though larger ones that I have used are better. You don't need those intended for hard floor; the ones for carpet are good for either.

customer_reviews.title: They make sliding furniture on hardwood floors easy.
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased these long ago. They make sliding furniture on hardwood floors easy.

customer_reviews.title: I've used this brand before and am very satisfied. Thank goodness there is a product that enables ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank EZ HS for their prompt delivery. I haven't used the moves as yet. However, I've used this brand before and am very satisfied. Thank goodness there is a product that enables an older person to move heavy furniture with ease.

The carpet sliders have worked great for making it easy to slide the table off my rug without damaging my wood floors. The wood floor sliders also work well.

customer_reviews.title: I do not have a use for the felt ones currently but if they are as good as the plastic ones your furniture will slide like ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sets of these. The plastic ones work really well for sliding my couch around on my carpet. I do not have a use for the felt ones currently but if they are as good as the plastic ones your furniture will slide like a man trying to catch a pig in mud with his bare hands.

product_meta.title: Furniture Movers - 3.5 Inch Width Plastic and Felt Sliders - Protector Moving Pads for Carpet, Hardwood, Linoleum, and Other Hard Surfaces - Set of 8 Included
product_meta.description:
EZ GLYDE VARIETY PACK: THE COMPLETE SOLUTION FOR MOVING ALL YOUR FURNITURE WITH EASE WHILE PROTECTING YOUR CARPET AND HARDWOOD FLOOR! 

Would you like to rearrange your heavy furniture without wasting a ton of time or energy? Rather than breaking your back trying to lift your heavy couch and carrying it to THAT side of the living room, would you like an ultra convenient solution that will allow you to easily glide your couch to the desired location without scratching your gorgeous hardwood flooring?

If so, EZ GLYDE VARIETY PACK is the perfect solution for you! Our set of plastic and felt sliders are designed specifically to help you move your furniture with ease while protecting your floor. Linoleum, marble, or hardwood floor? No worries, simply place a hardwood floor protector, FELT GLYDER under each leg of the furniture and watch it move without putting in much effort. Rugs or carpeted floors? No problem! Place a carpet protector, PLASTIC GLYDER underneath each leg of the furniture and move it with ease!

EZ GLYDE is the perfect solution for all floor types with a number of key features: 
- Set of 4 plastic sliders (Rnd 3.5 inch width) for rugs and carpeted floors. 
- Set of 4 felt sliders (Rnd 3.5 inch width) for tiled, laminated, and hardwood floors. 
- Designed to be a hardwood and carpet protector when moving your furniture. No more scuffs or scratches. 
- Durable foam top that keeps EZ GLYDE from slipping while moving your furniture. 
- Thick enough that you can use EZ GLYDE as a spacer/riser for your furniture.

EZ GLYDE VARIETY PACK comes with Manufacturer Lifetime Guarantee. No need to needlessly exhaust your energy moving furniture the old fashioned way. Make moving your furniture a breeze by clicking "Add to Cart" now!
feature_bullets: SAVE YOURSELF TIME, ENERGY AND BACKACHES: Designed to help you move your furniture with ease while protecting your carpet or hardwood floors.

NO DAMAGED FLOORS: Protects carpeted, hardwood, tiled or laminate flooring from scuffs and scratches. The plastic furniture sliders act as carpet protector while the felt sliders act as hardwood floor protectors when moving furniture.
VARIETY PACK: Includes 4 reusable plastic pads and 4 felt furniture pads to handle all floor types.

BUILT TO LAST: Made from premium felt material, plastic, and foam. Will not rip or break apart. The top portion is made of non-stick rubber that will firmly grip furniture legs. Use and reuse these furniture slides made to withstand the test of time.
TRY IT RISK FREE: These set of furniture movers comes with a manufacturer's lifetime guarantee when sold by My EZ Home Solutions ONLY!
